author: patrickl
msg: This patch makes the SAX's EntityResolver instance configurable and available via the set/get method. Also, private schema variables are now protected, instead of private, to allow child of this class to use it. Now Tomcat-5 will use the setEntityResolver to implement XML schema support locally.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added documentation on the namespace prefix matching trick

author: patrickl
msg: This patch add a small condition when setting the Digester publicId value. When a parser try to resolve a DTD, the first validation will contains the proper dtd public's ID, but second invokation will be equal to null. This patch fixes a bug in Tomcat 4.0 and 5.0.
